mapper.select: select price_type as priceType,amount from t_funtime_1v1_price where id = #{id}
select count(id) from t_funtime_1v1_record where user_id = #{userId} and state = 2 and create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
select id,user_id as userId,price_type as priceType,price from t_funtime_1v1_record where state = 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_funtime_1v1_record (user_id,room_id,price_type,price,state,expire_time) values (#{userId},#{roomId},#{priceType},#{price},#{state},DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL (select parameter_value-6 from t_funtime_parameter where parameter_key = 'match_seconds') second))
mapper.update: update t_funtime_1v1_record set state = 3 where expire_time > now()
update t_funtime_1v1_record set state = 2,room_id = #{roomId} where id = #{id}
update t_funtime_1v1_record set state = 3 where id = #{id}
